Title: SportRack Adjustable Bicycle Stand for Two Bikes -Steel (Vinyl-Coated)
text: This is the exact same item as the Thule Bike Stacker that costs $230 plus tax (making it about $250 after tax) with the only difference being the sticker across the top. This has been confirmed by several bike forums online that they're made on the same assembly line and the sticker slapped on at the end is the only difference. Great rack in great condition and a great way to save a few bucks over buying new.  •Sport Rack SR0012 Adjustable Bike Stand •Neat, balanced mounting for every style bike •Infinite adjustable bike hangers •V-shaped bike soft rubber holders will not mar paint or crush cables •1" x 2" steel construction wont bend even with heavy cruisers •Dimensions: 44.5 x 17.4 x 2.9 inches

Title: KINK 2022 WHIP XL BMX BIKE (21" TOPTUBE) (SAGE GREY)
text: $499.99 ~> $450 This bike is BRAND NEW Limited chance to pick up some of the last remaining gems from Lawson Cycles! (recently closed) Save $, shipping, assembly and sales tax. Local & cash sales only.  Do you find yourself really wanting to get the Kink Whip, but find the 20.5" toptube too short? We've got some good news; the 2022 Kink Whip XL. The Whip XL takes things to the next level with a 21" toptube, components made from chromoly, and every bearing being fully sealed for pro level strength and performance. The frame, forks, handlebars, and cranks are constructed out of 100% 4130 chromoly, the same material that can be found on top level bikes. Kink didn't stop there. They also included many other parts that can be ordered as aftermarket upgrades such as the Bold stem, Hemlocks, Nexus 25 tooth sprocket, and Bomber stealth pivotal seat. It's hard to believe the price when seeing everything the Kink Whip comes with.  Specifications: Frame: 100% 4130 Chromoly Fork: Kink Stryker 4130 Chromoly Steerer (Tapered Fork Legs) Headset: Mission Sealed Integrated (41.8° x 45°) Stem: Kink Bold HRD (50mm Reach) Bars: Kink T900 9" 100% 4130 Chromoly Grips: Kink Ace Flangeless Cranks: Kink Ridge 3-Piece Tubular Chromoly 8 Spline (170mm Length) Bottom Bracket: Sealed Mid (19mm) Pedals: Kink Hemlock NF Chain: Mission 410 Sprocket: Mission Nexus 6061 Aluminum (25 Tooth) Front Hub: Mission Foxtrot Sealed (3/8" Axle) Rear Hub: Mission Engage Sealed Cassette (14mm Axle) Driver: 9 Tooth Sealed Bearings (Right Hand Drive) Front Rim: Mission Mylar Rear Rim: Mission Mylar Front Tire: Kink Sever (20 x 2.4") Rear Tire: Kink Sever (20 x 2.4") Seat: Kink Bomber Stealth (Stealth Pivotal) Seat Post: Mission Stealth (Stealth Pivotal Seat Post) Seat Clamp: Mission Slim Clamp Lever: Mission Token Brake Cable: Mission L4 Linear Brakes: Mission Cease V2 Gyro Tabs: Drilled (Not Included) Color: Sage Grey Weight: 27 lbs 12 oz  Frame Geometry: Toptube: 21" Chainstays: 13.25" Headtube Angle: 75° Seattube Angle: 71° Stand Over Height: 9" Bottom Bracket Height: 11.6" Fork Offset: 32mm

text: Huffy Cranbrook Cruiser Bike - Medium  Please email, text or call  All bikes I sell get the following Tune Up before sale and are ready to ride for trouble free enjoyment for a long time. Some pictures of the bikes I have for sale are before Tune Ups are completed. If the bikes for sale are not ready today they will be ready in one to two days if I you want to purchase the bike. Just contact me for more information. In addition you can bring the bike back for 90 days for any adjustment needed including flat tires free of charge.  Tune Up work includes - Clean entire bike - Safety check of all fasteners and parts - Replace broken or missing parts - True wheels, adjust hub, replace rim strip, tube and tire as required - Install new shifter and brake cables as required and adjust derailleur's, shifters and brakes. - Install new brake pads as required - Lube chain and other moving parts as required

text: Up for sale are various Yakima roof rack components, available individually or as a lot. All prices are OBO. Please include a phone number when you email me and I'll get back to you ASAP. Thanks!  - 4 Yakima Q-28 Clips. The paint is chipping, but could easily be resprayed and function as they should. A list of vehicles the Q28 clips fit can be found in the photos - $30  - 2 Yakima bike racks. One full tray and one "half tray"; both includes strap for rear wheel and all mounting accessories to attach it to Yakima round bars. The racks are in good condition and work as they should. No lock cores, but one can be added and it still securely holds bikes without one. The "half tray" is missing the skewer, but you can easily buy one or just use the one off your bike while using the rack. - $30 for both

Title: Boys bike Specialized 20 in 5-7 yr
text: 20in Boys Specialized Hot Rock bike perfect for 5-7 yr old. Original owner; purchased at Peloton bikes in Fort Collins. Great shape, no rust, newer tires have plenty of tread left! Only visible wear is on rubber handlebar ends but otherwise a fun and functional bike. This bike can do a lot of off road as well as neighborhood riding and bike trails.  Price is firm.  We'll set it on the driveway for your review, ring doorbell if ready to purchase.

Title: Vintage Gazelle (Dutch) Tour Populaire 3-speed
text: I'm clearing out my garage and letting go of my 1978 Gazelle Tour Populair 3-speed cruiser bike.  Steel frame, in good shape, Sturmey-Archer 3-speed hub (stamped '78' so assuming that was the bike's manufacture year), gears work and I replaced the shifter control and 3d printed a lime green roller wheel for the cable (sorry, was only color filament I had at the the time).  Altenburger Synchron brakes.  There's a bit of rust on the front rim (see photos), but I put new tires on it last year and have barely ridden it since.  Comes with an almost new Brooks Champion Flyer saddle, Vans grips, and a couple miscellaneous but effective lights.  This is fun bike for someone that appreciates the geometry and style of Dutch bikes from the late 1970's.

Title: Indoor Bike Trainer-Minoura Inter Rim- Rim Drive-Won't wear Tire-Quiet
text: Selling a rare type of indoor bike trainer. Minoura Inter Rim "Ergo" RDA Rim Drive. Won't wear out your tire. It has pair of rubber rollers that rub on your rim insted of your tire.    Adjustable and quiet. It uses adjustable magnetic resistance with a selector switch that mounts on your handlebars.  Works on road or mountain bikes.     Selling for $100.00 Cash  Please call me @ 97o-42o-39threeeeeeeeeee8  No texts or emails please     bicycle training home gym cycling train race

Title: WPS Motorcycle Cover (Sportbike, Touring Bike)
text: Brand new motorcycle cover.  I got this as a gift and never used it.  Will fit most Sportbikes up to 1000cc - may not fit over something very big like a Hayabusa.  Will also fit most touring bikes other than very large ones.  Pickup in SW Fort Collins.  Thanks!

Title: Grulla Family Safe Mare - Trail Horse
text: Esmeralda is a Trail Savvy, Family Friendly and In Your Pocket Pony. She is the whole package. SAFE! BROKE! And Sweet as they come. Esmeralda has ridden all over, in town around heavy traffic, bikes, strollers… She will cross anything in front of her including but not limited to staircases, bridges, tunnels, lakes and rivers. Esmeralda has had ropes thrown off her, ponied cows and other horses and is great with tarps, flags and all things scary. Esmeralda is a gem with children of all ages but built like a brick house and sturdy for an adult. Esmeralda comes out of Adobe Town HMA which is known for having drafty mustangs, her build highly resembles a Haflinger as she is as wide as she is tall, drafty neck and has beautiful feathering on her fetlocks. She has strong hooves and goes great barefoot on any terrain. She is sure footed and a mount you can trust weather on slick, steep or rocky footing, she won’t miss a beat. She has been ridden out alone ad in groups and will ride in front or in back of a herd. NOT marish at all. She will meet you at the gate, stands great for bathes, grooming, tacking and takes the bridle just as she should. Esmeralda knows to lay down and is well accomplished in liberty with some training in bridleless as well. She is lower in the pecking order and gets along with anyone in the herd. She’s as easy keeper and healthy as can be. Esmeralda knows her leads and has dabbled in jumping, she is her prime and loves any job you give her. She is an amazing babysitter. Esmeralda is a bit more whoa then go but will give speed when asked and keeps up fine with a group, she’s just not one to ever be in a hurry. Esmeralda is good for bathes, great for the farrier and walks right in and backs out of the trailer. I can’t say enough good things about this mare and am so looking forward to her finding her perfect family or person. If there are any questions I can answer for you or if you’d like to meet her please don’t hesitate to reach out.  She is available through HorseBay and her sale starts Saturday.

Title: Specialized S-works Epic Mountain Bike
text: Specialized’s S-Works Epic was one of the most iconic cross country race bikes of all time, utilizing the Fox Float R’s “brain” to fully lock out while climbing and become fully active while descending.   Sure, bikes have gotten a lot slacker, longer travel, and bigger wheels… but this bike is still super fun and will out climb many full suspension bikes out there.   If you want to throw it back old school and do some classic cross country mountain biking on a 26” beast, then look no further.  There is some standard wear and tear on the bike, the paint has met some rocks but it rides great overall.   This would make a great bike for a teenager starting to race XC or a beginner just getting into mountain biking.   Also, matte black was and still is the coolest bike color.   Frame size: Large  Build:  SRAM x9 rear Bontrager superstock wheels Nokian NBX 2.3 tire Maxxis Icon 2.2 Manitou TPC fork  Sram X0 grip shifts Avid mag and single digit brakes Thompson Elite Seatpost Salsa Moro Ace Bars M5 alloy frame  Frame size large   Let me know if you have any questions or if you want to take it for a spin!   $900 OBO

Title: Black Sheep Pine Ridge SS titanium Cyclocross Bike
text: I have a beloved Black Sheep Pine Ridge Single Speed Titanium Cyclocross bike for sale.   Hand build by the legendary James Bleakley right here in Fort Collins, this beautiful ti cyclocross frame is looking for a new home.   It is currently set up as a single speed, but I recently had James weld on a derailleur hanger and disk tabs with the intention of turning it into a gravel machine.   Current components on the bike make a functional SS cyclocross race bike, or it has potential to be an amazing gravel build!   Jame's customs frames start at $3500 for a straight line frame and his lead times can be quite long. Black sheep bikes rarely come up for sale used on Craigslist so if you are looking for a beautiful, functional titanium bike to ride or build into your dream bike this is for you!  Feel free to email me with questions about the bike or specifics. I’m near city park in Fort Collins if you want to take it for a test spin!   TT -57 ST - 53 DT - 64  Current build: -Ultegra hubs laced up on Velocity Synergy and Interloc Rims  -Shimano Gossamer Crank -American Classic Alu seat post -Surly tentioners, cog and spacer kit -IRD Prestige carbon fork with steel steer tube -Deda stem -IRD cyclocross levers -Shimano SS brake levers -FSA headset -Avid Shorty 4 brakes -Gamut chain guard -Maxxis crossmark 2.1 rear tire (it will clear 2.1 tires for the snow) -Kenda something or other front tire -(Currently has brand new maxxis 40c rambler cross tires on it) -Avid shorty 4 and

Title: 2009 HARLEY DAVIDSON CVO DYNA FAT BOB..
text: 2009 CVO (Custom Vehicle Operation) DYNA FAT BOB SCREAMIN EAGLE... Sunrise Yellow Pearl/ Platinum Quartz with CVO graphics from the factory.  CVO is Harley's top of the line motorcycle with tons of chrome and custom features.  Bike is immaculate.  Stock 110 6 speed with Vance and Hines exhaust and also have stock tommy gun exhaust.  Bike has 10,200 miles and had the 10K service recently done by Harley.  Many custom pieces on the bike...detachable windshield, rider backrest and rack.  POD lights throughout bike which is really nice at night, chrome inner primary, chrome Screaming Eagle big sucker breather..    Service records, bike FAX and owners manual included. area.    I am the second owner. This was purchased new in Texas and spent life in Oklahoma...no rust or chrome pitting issues...it is perfect.  Scott @ 214 870 3624  leave voice message with return phone number if unavailable.  Gas prices are not coming down anytime soon and with price increases and limited availablility the price of preowned bikes will be going up with warmer weather.  ***  CVO paint is in a class by itself..pearl with a nice metal flake finish is gorgeous.  IF AD IS UP BIKE IS AVAILABLE.  .  The low profile (easily flat foot this bike at stop lights)  the larger tire makes for a real comfortable bike.  Read reviews on the Fat Bob...considered one of Harley's best handling bikes and these models continue to dominate Harley's line-up.

Title: 2016 OUTBACK 210URS TRAVEL TRAILER
text: This super clean trailer weighs only 4690 LBs and sleeps up to 8 comfortably. The model has a king size bed that slides out the rear and at 23' overall length when shut it can get into tight spots. Fully functional when the slide is closed the model allows for easy access to the kitchen and bathroom when on the road. Here's a few of the highlights.. Sits high on axles for clearance, sealed heated underbelly for winter use, side cargo door w/ hinged bunk which allows for bikes/storage, ducted AC & heat, outside kitchenette, booth dinette/sleeper, jackknife sofa sleeper, radius arched interior roof, 3 burner stove w/oven, microwave, gas/electric refrigerator, large pantry, tons of storage, flatscreen TV, am/fm/cd/dvd stereo, indoor/outdoor speakers, shower/tub combo, power awning, aluminum rims and excellent tires.. Dealer #44379... ASK FOR JEFF 303-913-4714

Title: 2021 Norco Revolver Size Large
text: 2021 Norco Revolver FS 1 120 mountain bike, size large,$3,800 OBO. Bought this to use for longer rides, but turns out I just like my enduro bike too much. Bought back in April of 2021 It only has maybe 20 or so rides on it. Excellent condition, only blemishes are some scuffing on the rear triangle and a scratch in the paint on the top tube (seen in last 2 pictures). All components are stock except for the dropper post. I swapped out the original for a KS Lev Integra 125mm because my girlfriend was riding the bike and the 150mm was too tall.  Specs Frame: 2021 Norco Revolver FS 1 120, size large Rear Shock: RockShox SIDLuxe Select+ (120mm travel) Fork: RockShox Sid Select+ (120mm travel) Shifter/Derailleur: Sram GX Eagle Cassette: Sram XG1275 10-52T Brakes: Sram G2 RSC Dropper Post: KS Lev Integra 125mm Wheels: DT Swiss XR 1700 spline 350 hubs  https://www.norco.com/bikes/2021/mountain/xc-race/revolver-fs-120/revolver-fs-1-120/

Weight (kg): 187.8Wet Weight (lbs): 414Wheelbase (in): 58.7Wheelbase (mm): 1491Wheels Composition: AluminumWidth (inches): 32Width (mm): 820.4SpeedometerTachometerDescription:ESCAPE THE ORDINARY The Honda Rebel 500 is a bike that breaks out from the world of traditional motorcycle style and escapes from the boring boulevard drone. It all starts with a narrow 471cc twin-cylinder engine with plenty of user-friendly power. The blacked-out look, light weight, and low seat height are winners everywhere, and features like Honda’s slip/assist clutch help make riding more enjoyable. And where some cruiser-class bikes are only fun if you ride slow, the Rebel 500 is happy to kick it up a notch. You can even get anti-lock brakes. Plus, for 2021, we’ve added fresh new colors, and our new Rebel 500 ABS SE, a version that comes with a selection of some of our most popular accessories, pre-installed, like our Black Diamond-Stitch Seat, Black Fork Boots and Covers, and a Black Headlight Cowl. So don’t let anyone put you into a cage—discover a new Rebel 500 and escape the ordinary. Title: Upcoming Storage Auction
text: BlueMountain Self Storage, 4888 Ronald Reagan Blvd., Johnstown, CO 80537 has possessory lien on all of the goods stored in the prospective units below. All these items of personal property are being sold pursuant to the assertion of the lien on April 15, 2022 at 11:00 AM in order to collect the amounts due. The sale will take place online at www.StorageAuctions.com to satisfy the lien.
